attributes.action: Change the law to remove the anonymity for children under eighteen who commit serious crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Youths and children who commit serious crimes remain anonymous and once they reach eighteen, their records are no taken into account when applying for jobs or if they commit further crimes.  If this anonimity was to be removed, it may serve as a deterent to some of the youngster who carry out these crimes.
